name: Experiment Or Die #155
description: Project to create a new collage every day for a year using my years of personal assets and ongoing content creation. I'm a film and TV junky. When I was interning in NYC I got to work on the editorial layout of a Rizzoli book about the film industry and we were provided with HUNDREDS of photos from film and behind the scenes on films. I was searching through my computer when i started this project and it turns out I had a whole folder of those photos including this image of Madonna from Suddenly Seeking Susan and the Stay Puft Marshmallow Man. I love the escapism of entertainment though I don't really have much to complain about it my real life. I just love being able to experience the worlds and stories of people and lives that are different than my own, even just for a few minutes or hours at a time. That is the beauty of the metaverse, you will not only be able to watch these other lives but you will be able to EXPERIENCE them like never before. Twitter and IG: Nikejerk
